classPropertyAsProtected.ts(15,3): error TS2445: Property 'x' is protected and only accessible within class 'C' and its subclasses.
classPropertyAsProtected.ts(16,3): error TS2445: Property 'y' is protected and only accessible within class 'C' and its subclasses.
classPropertyAsProtected.ts(17,1): error TS2322: Type '1' is not assignable to type 'null'.
classPropertyAsProtected.ts(17,3): error TS2445: Property 'y' is protected and only accessible within class 'C' and its subclasses.
classPropertyAsProtected.ts(18,3): error TS2445: Property 'foo' is protected and only accessible within class 'C' and its subclasses.
classPropertyAsProtected.ts(20,3): error TS2445: Property 'a' is protected and only accessible within class 'C' and its subclasses.
classPropertyAsProtected.ts(21,1): error TS2721: Cannot invoke an object which is possibly 'null'.
classPropertyAsProtected.ts(21,3): error TS2445: Property 'b' is protected and only accessible within class 'C' and its subclasses.
classPropertyAsProtected.ts(22,1): error TS2322: Type '1' is not assignable to type 'null'.
classPropertyAsProtected.ts(22,3): error TS2445: Property 'b' is protected and only accessible within class 'C' and its subclasses.
classPropertyAsProtected.ts(23,3): error TS2445: Property 'foo' is protected and only accessible within class 'C' and its subclasses.


==== classPropertyAsProtected.ts (11 errors) ====
    class C {
        protected x: string;
        protected get y() { return null; }
        protected set y(x) { }
        protected foo() { }
    
        protected static a: string;
        protected static get b() { return null; }
        protected static set b(x) { }
        protected static foo() { }
    }
    
    var c: C;
    // all errors
    c.x;
      ~
!!! error TS2445: Property 'x' is protected and only accessible within class 'C' and its subclasses.
    c.y;
      ~
!!! error TS2445: Property 'y' is protected and only accessible within class 'C' and its subclasses.
    c.y = 1;
    ~~~
!!! error TS2322: Type '1' is not assignable to type 'null'.
      ~
!!! error TS2445: Property 'y' is protected and only accessible within class 'C' and its subclasses.
    c.foo();
      ~~~
!!! error TS2445: Property 'foo' is protected and only accessible within class 'C' and its subclasses.
    
    C.a;
      ~
!!! error TS2445: Property 'a' is protected and only accessible within class 'C' and its subclasses.
    C.b();
    ~~~
!!! error TS2721: Cannot invoke an object which is possibly 'null'.
      ~
!!! error TS2445: Property 'b' is protected and only accessible within class 'C' and its subclasses.
    C.b = 1;
    ~~~
!!! error TS2322: Type '1' is not assignable to type 'null'.
      ~
!!! error TS2445: Property 'b' is protected and only accessible within class 'C' and its subclasses.
    C.foo();
      ~~~
!!! error TS2445: Property 'foo' is protected and only accessible within class 'C' and its subclasses.
